name: Relationship Expansion Pack
backDesc:
What's more romantic
 than being understood?
preview: How well do you know your partner? How well do they know you?
Communication creates partnership, but that requires sharing your truth and being open to receiving theirs. Especially when it's uncomfortable.
This relationship expansion pack can be added to the original WNRS card game. Remember there are two ways to play this game. Either play safe, or play to grow. The second is how you win.
questions:
How important do you think
 birthdays and holidays are
 to me? Explain.

On a scale of 1-10, how open do
 you feel I am with you? Explain.

Who do you think was
 more nervous on our first
 date? Explain.

What was the first thing
 you noticed about me?

What do you think my
 perfect date night
 would be?

What assumption did you
 make about me that turned
 out to be false?

What did our worst
 argument teach you?

What has this relationship
 taught you about yourself?

What's one small way I can
 be a better partner?
What do you wish we did more of?

What have you been extra
 sensitive to lately?

What's the most important
 lesson a past relationship
 has taught you?

What are you currently
 working through that I
 don't see, if anything?

Have I helped you change
 your mind about anything?

How do I show that I love
 you without telling you?

What's one small way we
 can improve our sex life?

What feelings are hard for
 you to communicate to me?
 How can I make it easier?

What about you feels
 hardest to love?

How have you seen me grow
 in this relationship?

What have I helped you
 appreciate about yourself?

What recent experience
 made you feel closer to me?

What immediately attracted
 you to me? What attracted
 you more over time?

What fear do you think
 holds me back the most?

What song
 best describes
 our relationship?

How does our age difference,
 or lack thereof, affect us?
 If at all?

What's the most
 attractive thing I do
 without realizing it?

What's the most
 romantic thing I've done
 for you recently?

How does one earn your
 trust? Have I earned it?
 How can I earn more?

Finish the sentence: Thank
 you for accepting _________.

What would a day of
 completely spoiling me
 look like?

What made you fall
 in love with me?

Do you think my job affects
 me positively or negatively?
 How does it affect us?

Are there any insecurities
 from previous relationships
 that you carried into this
 one? If so, what are they?

When was the last time I hurt
 you, perhaps unintentionally?

What's the best gift
 I've given you? Material
 and immaterial?

The hardest thing for me
 to reveal about myself
 to you was _________.

How do our strengths and
 weaknesses complement
 each other?

Wild Card Write a love song for
 your partner. 1 minute.
 Perform for each other.

Wild Card Write down the top 3 things
 your partner does that
 makes you feel most loved.
 Both players. Compare.

Wild Card On a scale of 1-10 write down the
 importance of having kids to you.
 Compare and explain.

Wild Card Write down one small way
 you can be better in this
 relationship. Both players. Compare.

Wild Card Draw one of your favorite
 memories from our relationship.
 30 seconds. Compare.

Wild Card Write down the title you
 would give this chapter of
 our relationship. Compare.

Wild Card Ask your partner something
 you've never asked them before.

Wild Card Write a short guide of how
 to love your partner well.
 30 seconds. Compare.

What answer of mine
 surprised you the most
 throughout this game,
 if any?

Is there anything you
 still don't know about me
 that you wish you did?

Thank you for helping me
 realize _________ about myself.

What don't I give myself
 enough credit for?

What goal would feel best for
 you to accomplish this year? How
 can I support you in that?

What about our relationship
 are you proudest of?

What did this conversation teach
 you about our relationship? What
 did it teach you about yourself?

Wild Card Write down your intention for
 our relationship. Compare.

Wild Card Write down the top 3 things
 you're most grateful for in
 your partner. 30 seconds.
 Compare.
